sentences.english: The physician has gone into semiretirement because of ill health.
sentences.chinese: 這位醫生由於健康不佳已經處於半退休狀態了。

sentences.english: She has little vision, decreased hearing and cannot speak.
sentences.chinese: 她的視力不佳，聽力下降，也不能說話。

sentences.english: Reception of TV programmes is unsatisfactory here.
sentences.chinese: 這裏電視節目的接收情況不佳。

sentences.english: The prior preserved fruit has poor taste due to more stones and less flesh.
sentences.chinese: 現有果脯食品核多肉少，口感不佳。

sentences.english: To concede a goal in the last minute is really bad luck.
sentences.chinese: 但要承認，在最後一分鐘失球確實運氣不佳。

sentences.english: But given the company's history of poor labor relations, one must wonder.
sentences.chinese: 但鑑於該公司勞資關係記錄不佳，人們須有所懷疑。

sentences.english: Gudjohnsen returns to training but is clearly weak.
sentences.chinese: 古迪約翰森迴歸到訓練場但是狀態不佳。

sentences.english: Ill health had pouched the loose flesh under his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 健康不佳使得他眼下面的肌肉鬆弛。

sentences.english: The luxury of carrying under-performing employees is now a thing of the past.
sentences.chinese: 承擔表現不佳的員工的奢侈行爲已經成爲過去。

sentences.english: The economic effect of the assistance was not satisfactory, and its goal was political.
sentences.chinese: 但美援的經濟效果不佳，政治性是其主要目的。

sentences.english: Consumers are still over-indebted and household finances are perilously balanced.
sentences.chinese: 消費者依然負債過度，家庭財務狀況嚴重不佳。

sentences.english: She attributed  his bad temper to ill health.
sentences.chinese: 她把他的壞脾氣歸咎於健康不佳。

sentences.english: This article oil-proof is ineffective, to the surface that have oil-proof request should carefully process.
sentences.chinese: 本品防油效果不佳，對有防油要求的表面應謹慎處理。

sentences.english: The vintage was not good but the prices remained high.
sentences.chinese: 雖然酒的年份不佳，但是其價格始終居高不下。

sentences.english: But the effect of performance management is not good in our country state-owned enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 但是在我國國有企業中績效管理實施的效果不佳。

definition: range (the difference between the lowest and highest values)
to show/to show off/to display/to manifest/expression/manifestation/show/display/performance (at work etc)/behavior
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]
